*

Filthy Animal

Apr 12, 2011

“Wait! Are you married to Paula Abla?” asked Kevin as Harry held him up against the wall. “What? No. Shaddup.” His fist met Kevin’s face. “How about Sarah Jones?” “No.” Punch. “Marcia Henderson?” “No.” Punch. “Bridget Heinz?” “No.” Punch. Blood trickled down Kevin’s face. “Rachel Timms?” “No.” Punch. Where had Marv gone? “Look,” said Kevin. “You gotta stop this. My blood shouldn’t be flowing like this.” “What are you talking about, kid? What kind of blood you got?” “Type F, and it should only be coming out of my kidneys.” “Nah nah that’s all wrong. It don’t come through there. Shut your mouth.” Punch. Punch. Punch.
